title: What are some love story plot twists? - Quora

response.answer_text:
Well, this isn’t a story, but it’s the lyrics to a love song by the Korean rapper/idol Zico titled “She’s a Baby”: This is the translated version: I can’t believe it This is the first time That I've poured out this much Blunt words Hidden feelings With one kiss, I've figured it all out You’re special, I admit it All of my energy goes towards you It’s okay, I’ll look after you all day now  She’s a baby, once you get to know her, she’s a baby She’ll get in big trouble if you leave her alone all day Bad bad, you better not touch a single hair on her Let her sleep well, yeah  Listen carefully, I'll tickle you without using my hands Will you stop saying that you like me In the near future You’re gonna end up Loving me a lot When you’re this happy
 You shouldn’t turn around, ah ah
 How ya feel, how you do feel?
 Nod your head up and down  She’s a baby, once you get to know her, she’s a baby She’ll get in big trouble if you leave her alone all day Bad bad, you better not touch a single hair on her Let her sleep well yeah  Wrapped around my thumb Your small hands smell like peaches How attractive do I have to become For you to only look at me Without anything left over I'll give you everything, even if I become nothing I told you, it's all or nothing for me Not enough I’m gonna do it until it strains my heart During hard times, leave it to me I'll cleanly resolve everything Then come into my arms without a word I used to be a maniac that brings confusion But soon, you won't be able to forget me I’m your baby   She’s a baby, once you get to know her, she’s a baby Never gonna leave her aloneI really envy your boyfriend The last line…

“I swear, baby. I’ll make sure I will call you up each day no matter what” said George to Jenny while he crushed his ribs onto hers. “Please don’t leave me alone. Don’t go away” continued George while he whined, as his teardrops started drenching the left portion of her shoulder. But she still appeared calm & composed. George breathed a heavy sigh and clapped his eyebrows very rapidly to scatter away his tears from rolling down. “I am sure you will forget me once you step away from my sight” George gave a thought to himself while he still submerged his face into her heavy heart brooding over their long-distance relationship. A series of thoughts dragged him into his past where Jenny once told him, “I am not going to leave you even in my death” George had a look for one last time on Jenny’s coffin where the bold lettering read – ST. GEORGE FUNERAL SERVICES. With a positive yet heavy heart, he let go of him from her with a strong will to continue his 60 years of love towards her.
